attributes.action: Send armed forces immediately to protect the civilized world from isis,
attributes.additional_details: Isis, pose an immediate and long term threat to the security of the democratic world ,along with NATO allies we should take decisive action in engaging Isis  and showing them that their actions will not be tolerated by civilized society, this is not a war against any religion but against radical terrorists and dictatorial fanatical groups, which if allowed to establish themselves in northern Iraq will become a magnet for every radical terrorist movement in the world,,they need to be eliminated and their leaders  brought to justice and all funds seized,
